meanings.definition: A small railway truck or car typically used in mines.
meanings.sent1: The miners loaded the coal onto the bogie to transport it out of the mine.
meanings.sent2: The bogie rattled along the tracks carrying heavy loads of ore.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous gnomes decided to take a joyride on the empty bogie, causing chaos in the mine.
meanings.sent4: The bogie rolled through the dark tunnels like a faithful workhorse, never tiring.
meanings.sent5: The rusty bogie creaked and groaned under the weight of the rocks, echoing in the cavern.

meanings.sent1: The children told spooky stories about the bogie that haunted the old graveyard.
meanings.sent2: Legend has it that a mischievous bogie lurks in the shadows, playing pranks on unsuspecting travelers.
meanings.sent3: The friendly bogie decided to help the lost hikers find their way back to the trail.
meanings.sent4: The eerie mist enveloped the bogie, making it appear even more ghostly in the moonlight.
meanings.sent5: The villagers whispered about the mysterious bogie that only appeared on foggy nights, vanishing before dawn.

meanings.definition: A type of wheel or roller used in machinery.
meanings.sent1: The mechanic replaced the worn-out bogie on the conveyor belt to keep it running smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The heavy machinery relied on sturdy bogies to move parts along the assembly line.
meanings.sent3: The playful kitten got its paw stuck in the bogie of the spinning wheel, causing a temporary halt in production.
meanings.sent4: The bogie spun faster and faster, resembling a whirlwind of motion in the factory.
meanings.sent5: The shiny new bogie gleamed under the fluorescent lights, a symbol of efficiency in the workshop.

meanings.sent1: The bogie thrived in the damp soil of the marsh, its leaves glistening with dew.
meanings.sent2: Birds nested among the tall stalks of the bogie, finding shelter in its dense foliage.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous frog used the bogie as a hiding spot, camouflaging itself among the green leaves.
meanings.sent4: The bogie swayed gently in the breeze, a verdant oasis in the midst of the marshland.
meanings.sent5: The delicate flowers of the bogie attracted butterflies, adding a splash of color to the wetlands.
